backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining roles, user profiles, authorization helpers, and profile management with state stored in maps and sets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent app changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for build and documentation use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining AquaFlow color variables and light/dark theme mappings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root container, favicon, metadata, and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling authentication, profile loading, onboarding redirects, protected routes, and error screens.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell with navigation, header, user info, notifications, logout handling, and routed content display.
frontend/src/components/AuthProfileLoadE: Error screen component that displays profile loading failures with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsBel: UI component showing a notifications bell popover with mock unread notifications.
frontend/src/features/reports/pdfGenerat: Generates a downloadable HTML-based PDF-like report and shows a success toast.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching the current user's profile, role, and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Mutation hook for saving the caller's user profile with error handling and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables for the app's color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Shows admin metrics, customer lists, deliveries, messages, and filters using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/CustomerDa: Provides customer delivery stats, additional bottle requests, and messaging using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/SalesmanDa: Allows salesmen to record deliveries and view stats, recent deliveries, and requests using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and routes users to onboarding or role-based dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/AdminOnboa: Captures admin name and saves an admin profile before navigating to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerOn: Customer onboarding form that saves the user profile with the customer role and navigates to the customer dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/RoleSelect: Role selection flow where users enter their name, pick a role, and save a profile before being routed to the appropriate dashboard with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SalesmanOn: Salesman onboarding form that saves the user profile with the salesman role and redirects to the salesman dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays report options based on user role and generates mock PDF reports.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions to format numbers as AED currency and per-bottle rates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records for the AquaFlow app.
